orego.heuristic

Class EscapeHeuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.heuristic.Heuristic
      • orego.heuristic.EscapeHeuristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class EscapeHeuristic
extends Heuristic
    Tries to save any friendly group put in atari by the last move, by capturing or extending.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(Board board)
        Description copied from class: Heuristic
        Called before any calls to evaluate on a given board state. For some heuristics, this avoids redundant computation. Overriding versions should usually call this version first, as it clears out goodMoves.
        Overrides:
        prepare in class Heuristic
